title: Pick and Pack an Order
description: A warehouse associate needs to pick and pack a new online order.

tasks.description: Retrieve a new order from the fulfillment queue on a handheld device.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate is assigned a new order to fulfill.

tasks.description: Follow the optimized picking path provided by the device to gather all items for the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate efficiently collects all correct items.

tasks.description: Scan each item to verify accuracy, pack the items into a box, and generate a shipping label.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is correctly packed and labeled, and its status is updated to 'Ready to Ship'.
